urls.title: Vodka Murdini Cocktail Recipe | The Bar
urls.description: Murdoc Niccals is affectionally regarded by the Gorillaz fandom community as Pickle (ode to his green skin) and we wouldn’t put it past him to consider himself the ideal candidate for the next Bond, so it was a no brainer to take the shaken, not stirred classic and whack a pickle in it.. Hold the olive.

data.text:
M Niccals (me) and @Smirnoffeurope request your presence at my LIVE COCKTAIL MASTERCLASS this Thursday!! Learn from the master (also me) as I expertly mix my signature Vodka Murdini live on air. Wanna follow along at home? Here's what you'll need: https://t.co/VJCP1QcAC6
 #18

urls.title: Webplex - MTV EMA INTL - Hybrid Homepage
urls.description: The 2022 MTV Europe Music Awards celebrate the best music of the year and the biggest artists from around the world. The show will air live on MTV from PSD Bank Dome on November 13!

data.text: Just heard that voting ends TONIGHT for the MTV EMAs – suppose I better figure out who to thank in my speech if Gorillaz win. His Majesty the King, for starters. Then thanks to the fans for voting. But mostly, thanks to me for creating Gorillaz. https://t.co/WRIz6hTsx3 https://t.co/lomdVXPVR0

Ahhhh. Bliss. I'm currently anointing myself in the sacred pool here at Silver Lake. Essentially it’s a hot tub filled with tap water (that I personally blessed), a secret blend of herbs, cheeses, and a half dozen bottles of Rasputin vodka. Maybe I should bottle this stuff?
The truth is out there, hidden among the pixels... Well that's what Russ reckons. Says if he stares at static long enough he'll find all the answers. Drummers, eh?
Salvation lies at the bottom of a very deep hole. Well, that's what I've been telling 2D. He's in the garden now with a shovel. Keep going, mate! You’ll get there.

bazinga!! nothing gets the spirit soaring like a double shot of Last Cult holy water, my own secret blend. Tell you what: any followers who reach Last Cult Level 20 will be rewarded with the recipe! Spoiler alert: you’re gonna need limes and a cocktail umbrella.

urls.title: Webplex - MTV EMA INTL - Hybrid Homepage
urls.description: The 2022 MTV Europe Music Awards celebrate the best music of the year and the biggest artists from around the world. The show will air live on MTV from PSD Bank Dome on November 13!

data.text:
Praise be to me! I am honoured, humbled but not remotely surprised that Gorillaz have been nominated at the MTV Europe Music Awards! Vote for us as Best Alternative Artist and your sins shall be cleansed. Cheers.
https://t.co/2FLVzRoQuW
Praise be to me! I’ve only gone and found a way to turn sound into solid gold! Get some of my alchemy that is NEW GOLD in your ears then tell me if you feel reborn https://t.co/eIrqgvlFRh

urls.title: Gorillaz, Tame Impala, Bootie Brown - New Gold (feat. Tame Impala and Bootie Brown)
urls.description: Listen to New Gold (feat. Tame Impala and Bootie Brown) by Gorillaz, Tame Impala, Bootie Brown.

data.text: There’s honestly nothing I like more on a Wednesday than playing a Gorillaz show in New York! Trust you’ll be joining me, 2D, Noodle and Russ at TD Garden for what promises to be THE BEST NIGHT IN BROOKLYN'S HISTORY x
Bloody hell, you've got to wonder what possesses people to dress up like pound-shop Gandalfs, hold hands and skip around the garden all day long. Honestly, that lot next door give cults a bad name...
Here's a Q for the hive mind: got any tips on how to extract a very stupid singer from a suit of armour? He’s done it again. Answers below plz! Ta.
Citizens of Detroit, roll out the pink carpet and put the cider on ice cos Gorillaz is incoming!! See you all tomorrow at Little Ceasars Arena for the latest of our soul-cleansing musical shindigs.

This is your Great Leader and High Beacon wishing all my followers another blessed day in the Last Cult. Praise be to Murdoc! Like and retweet to advance one level through the Last Cult's extremely laborious progression hierarchy. #PraiseBeToMurdoc https://t.co/vo1HpFE6Jt

To all my disciples attending our shows in Los Angeles this weekend, if any of you can get a group chant going of ‘PRAISE BE TO MURDOC’, I will grant you eternal salvation (and maybe even some signed merch?). See you there!

urls.description: Gorillaz New Gold

data.text:
Just spoken to a fan who says he’s played New Gold so many times he can no longer hear his own thoughts! Bless you, mate. Anyone top that?
https://t.co/ntwMHQU0iF https://t.co/IxfdpeNzG8
Praise be to the fans with the strongest New Gold sound videos. What you got!? https://t.co/7CG5sXrXfU

data.text:
Behold! I Murdoc Niccals, Supreme Overlord of the Last Cult, have miraculously transmuted something even more precious than gold! It’s called NEW GOLD, and it’s Gorillaz’ brand new track, recorded with @tameimpala & @bootiebrownOG OUT NOW! 

https://t.co/ntwMHQUy8d https://t.co/YPxKDhx61P

Hark, my cherubs, for the pink sun shines in the East!! Specifically upon All Points East in East London tomorrow – Gorillaz’ only UK festival show of the year! Trust your Great Leader, it’s gonna to be MIRACULOUS! (Blessings on all who attend) #TheLastCult #PraiseBeToMurdoc
https://t.co/zTHMG99oD9

urls.title: Twitter

data.text:
The hour is almost upon us... Specifically the hour of 6pm GMT, when I shall be beaming out direct from the inner sanctum! So come one and all and behold (via your ears) the first ever live-on-air miracle! It’s gonna be a CRACKER.

https://t.co/zTHMG99oD9

urls.title: Twitter
Twitter

data.text:
Would you Adam and Eve it, his most holiness and highest of all High Beacons (moi) is broadcasting once again and I need YOUR help! Spread the word, PRAISE BE.

https://t.co/zTHMG99oD9

@gorillaz It’s a miracle! Stoke’s thrice-time ‘Rear of the Year’ champion has finally found The One – ME. That’s right… I AM THE ONE, the Alpha and the Beacon, the Burning Light of the Pink Dawn. I share my greatness with no other, especially not that hippie next door! #PraiseBeToMurdoc
@galileanmoonzz @gorillaz That’s the question mate!! Who the bloody hell is she? Something’s proper rotten about this… investigations pending
@sciaecallo Soz pal I don't kiss n tell - especially if it HASNT EVEN HAPPENED YET
@whoCaresIamMe1 congrats you have just advanced six levels in The Last Cult progression system for having at least some brain cells….
@_L3pr3chaun_ Hmm I'd rather not pal - sounds like you're strayed onto the wrong path… Follow the pink light to salvation! #praisebetomurdoc
@LuzRive37475882 Life is short pal. If that’s what you want you go for it.
@deddeyez Yeah? Be a champ and let us know then, squire, cos we haven’t got the foggiest.

urls.title: Cracker Island (Official Video)
urls.description: The official video for Cracker Island by Gorillaz feat. Thundercat

data.text:
Weird, I don't remember shooting a video... Must be some kind of PROPHECY. Gather round, my lambs, and behold the future, a glimpse of tomorrow today. Praise be to Murdoc!

https://t.co/gdwoAKShcO https://t.co/CbrLuVlYVf

Awake, my minions! AVERT YOUR EYES WHEN I ADDRESS THEE! Actually soz I am gonna need your eyes. Have a butchers at this PROPHECY of what’s to come – behold the Pink Sun rises from the darkness!!! #endisthebeginning https://t.co/O71sziS0eV

RT @gorillaz: Murdoc Niccals in Cracker Island
COMING SOON 👀
#crackerisland #thelastcult https://t.co/eY179p1BJL

@gorillaz Does the eagle tell the worm about the wonder of wings? I believe not, Stuart. But even though you’re only a lowly muck-eater, with enough faith you too could one day be ascending to the heavens! Before that I’m gonna need a top up of holy water, squeeze of lime too. Praise be.

urls.title: Gorillaz: Cracker Island
urls.description: Pre-save now!

data.text:
On Cracker Island it was born --- as you shall be REBORN when you listen to our latest banger featuring the grand high @Thundercat https://t.co/N9ZjPmBC6c

Like and retweet for a miracle from your Great Leader!

#thelastcult #crackerisland

@gorillaz Bloody hell, 2D! What part pf “chronicle” don’t you get? I bought you that dictaphone to record the first days of the Last Cult, our great awakening! But you’re just toddling about recording absolute drivel. Also, it’s 14 sugars, mate. Other than that, lovely cuppa. #thelastcult

The hour is NIGH. Just a little reminder to JOIN ME at 6PM BST today. Oh got plans have ya? Learn to multi-task - I’m writing this tweet while levitating! 6pm today. Live and direct from my Mind Palace. Latecomers shall be forsaken!

https://t.co/VuCweP7h2D

https://t.co/VuCwePoRUb

data.text:
Awake my lambs! Transcend with me to Cracker Island and let your souls be cleansed in sound - it's our latest Gorillaz banger featuring @Thundercat https://t.co/N9ZjPmBC6c 

Praise be to Murdoc! #thelastcult #crackerisland
Oi you lot! Show numero uno's about to kick off! See you at Kong, SHARPISH. https://t.co/W4aOUKdFbS

Musical genius, style icon, actor, lover, fighter, and now - RADIO DJ. That’s right, I’m on air. IN FIFTEEN MINUTES. Tune in and let me help erase the memory of the previous three shows. Or are you busy? Thought not.

https://t.co/GrBkM2Nzfz - 7PM GMT / 11AM PST https://t.co/r07siVtUC8

urls.title: The Gorillaz Guide to Surviving a Trump Victory
urls.description: Murdoc F. Niccals, bassist and self-proclaimed founder/leader of the animated music group Gorillaz, writes about how to cope with the unthinkable on Tuesday.

data.text:
What’s this? Murdoc Niccals doing his bloody bit again? I never cease to amaze myself...

https://t.co/qd0V0mJK6b

OK gotta go - Russel’s chilli is ready. To be honest, I’m slightly dreading it, the last one did me a right mischief. But I don't want to offend him so I'll put on a brave face. Until next time, STAY SAFE, WORLD! #DebunkAries

RIGHT. All the eyebrow shamers out there saying I look like Bert from the Muppets! My usual barber’s is closed right now, obvs. So I did them myself with a blowtorch. Burned the lot off by mistake, had to draw them back on. #DebunkAries https://t.co/TK3MhYWhf6
@deathby_pixels I'm not sure you've fully grasped how the full stop works.
@rollsroyce1988 We're all coping with this situation in different ways.
@allweareisstarz Russ is not available right now. He's tuning up the machine.
@uglybarnicle025 Not bad. But lacking a solo shot of me.
@PottedPup_ You should probably change your underwear then.
@gorillazwrld Search your heart.
@Angie54778307 @murdocsimp Thanks Angie. Can't win with some of these people, can I.

Noodle, bless her, was worried cos 2D wasn’t wearing a helmet. The truth is, the boy’s got so many metal plates in his noggin from various head injuries over the years, his head is already a helmet. #DebunkAries https://t.co/IGRQaZo7zm
@murdocniggals Hello, Nat.

Geezer in the Lucha libre mask? My old amigo and adversary ‘El Fatto Pollo’. Came up against him on the amateur wrestling circuit in Pueblo a few years back. KO’d him in the third with a top-rope plancha. He retired last year (lumbago) and now works at Kong. #DebunkAries

Some of you asked how, on account of my gorgeous complexion, I can use a green screen? Fact: My skin is NOT green, it’s Chartreuse. A French colour and très sexy. Also goes well served over ice. #DebunkAries https://t.co/k23zhZGkx2
@JordanPowers95 You're right, Jordan. It is an important question.
@mudz_is_god I forgive you, Vince. Stay safe, pal.
@BuckthorpeEmma Stay tuned, Emma.
@artdisease Interesting theory, Sarah.
@thugsbunnie Very true.
@P1ratesProgress If I knew what he was hiding, I wouldn't need bloody truth serum, would I.
@quailnight That means a lot.

Right, that syringe. Keep your hair on, world. Nothing to soil yourselves over. It was just a bit of truth serum for the lad. Didn’t even bloody work. Reminds me, need to fire my chemist - been supplied a lot of duds lately. #DebunkAries https://t.co/QwoK2aFyU2
@gorillazfan102 Glad to have you on board, mate!
@Murd0c_is_G0d Bit of both, I reckon.
@hanayanaa I don't dance to your tune. You dance to mine.
@mudz_is_god No need to shout.
@__stinky_rat__ I'm wearing it right now.
@garnett_hadley Correct.
@S4turnzTr4bb I'm multi tasking.
@_StopTheDams_ Looks like your CAPS LOCK button is stuck, mate.
@artdisease Very sensible question, Sarah. Stay tuned.
@Rebecca_L_King All will be revealed, Rebecca...
Getting a lot of love for the cape, some of you asking if it’s my new style. Nah. Just fancied something billowy for the wind machine. #DebunkAries https://t.co/nNtxMOYUum

About that green screen. Rumbled. Yeah, I made the creative call that we film this one from base camp. Just to show the world what wonders can be achieved working from home. My way of inspiring you all. #DebunkAries https://t.co/o2EBf3qwna

Allo you lot. Murdoc Niccals here, in da house. I mean, where else would I be. Anyway, I'm back once again to give you lucky chumps an access all (some) areas tour of my latest masterpiece. Enjoy! #DebunkAries

Annnnd that’s your lot! Hope that clears up some of the stuff keeping you awake at night. And re the other stuff keeping you awake at night - not really my problem. But good luck with that. Until next time, world! #DebunkDesole
@thugsbunnie * Correction, 2D just informed me he actually found it in a skip down the road. But it's the thought that counts.
@thugsbunnie Thanks for noticing, biscotti. That's due to the great new foundation 2D bought for me. Because I'm worth it.
@WntrRhythm Wonderful, Lord Sumg WNTR. Feels like a second chance. Technically, more like a 12th chance, but this time I'm gonna make it count!

Russel’s carrot sticks / Noodle’s gloves are a metaphor for what Gorillaz is like when Murdoc isn’t around. I.e., ridiculous, a broken instrument, a machine missing it’s biggest cog. Very touching tribute to me. Thanks guys! Cheers @GoryPumpkin @melixay for asking #DebunkDesole https://t.co/yIIZMlUKZH
@drelladuh I identify as 6'2'', but probably more like 6' bang on.
@WichertAndre Thank you, Mike Cherry. Glad to find someone who understands science.
@feelgoodty Bang on. People asking how tall I am? I AM AS BIG AS A DOOR.
@jonthathing PERSPECTIVE. Wot, you think you're bigger than the moon do you?

@heniu97 @glowrillazart @Monielponi @kairose18 Truth is, little way back, we had a skirmish with a multi-headed hydra. It was getting out of hand, until Russ realised the chump was just in a bad mood, so he gave it a range of novelty hats for its many heads. That cheered it right up and resolved the situation.
Thanks to @HeyoMayo15 for the stupid question and this insulting graphic #DebunkDesole https://t.co/llinuKvbKq

Right, morons saying I’m short. Ever heard of PERSPECTIVE? When things are nearer to you, they get bigger. E.g., when a fist comes towards you, it gets bigger as it approaches your face. Plus, right, I was STOOPING at that point to convey my sadness (more great acting). OKAY. https://t.co/sUuO2cUbfk
@PottedPup_ @Monielponi @kairose18 Bollocks, got your name wrong.
@PottedPup_ @Monielponi @kairose18 And look at you supporting my redemption. Cheers. I won't forget this, Sleepy Monk
@Gorillazrm2nn @Monielponi @kairose18 Choice is an illusion, my friend. We are but a flea in a tornado of chaos. (Might get that printed on a t-shirt actually).
@ocryptid_ @Monielponi @kairose18 Really great, thanks for asking dumbass juggalo. We're better than ever. Soon as the weather clears we're going for a lovely ride together on our new tandem bike.
@garnett_hadley @Monielponi @kairose18 I try, Hadley. Thanks for having my back. Maybe you can convince some of the doubters out there that I really have changed!

Ta to @Monielponi and @kairose18 for asking: is 2D wearing my captain’s hat from Plastic Beach? Not the same one cos that got eaten (long story). But I bought a new one and gave it to the lad, a little good luck charm for his voyage. You look smashing, matey! #DebunkDesole https://t.co/asDQ9c6uov
@Gorillazrm2nn @SenseiJussa Very good question. I was trying to relate emotionally to Noodle's traumatic time spent in a crates. Just another way I'm working hard to connect better with the team!
@leianashton @SenseiJussa First I thought he'd been binging too much Stranger Things, but think he might be having another vision.
@WolfLs @SenseiJussa I am well aware of that mate. They only haunt my every waking moment.
@dark4shadowz @SenseiJussa Does a bit, yeah...

@MurdocGorillaz i’m gonna bark

@MurdocGorillaz Idk whether I should believe you or not https://t.co/rFOe2RjCcB
@murdocsimp This good feller https://t.co/yHt8dXnZVS
@MurdocGorillaz PLEASE JUST SAY HI TO ME PLEASE
@MurdocGorillaz murdoc please i love you, stay hydrated during these difficult times, and no, bacardi gold does not count as hydration. ♥️♥️♥️ and im sO SORRY I SHOUTED AT YOU ;^;
@MurdocGorillaz Thoughts on how people are saying you look like a Sesame Street character
@MurdocGorillaz Bit hypocritical mate considering your relationship with the truth
@MurdocGorillaz But why truth serum? What’s he hiding from you?
@MurdocGorillaz Hey Murdoc! I can see your socks!
@MurdocGorillaz ANSWER RELEVANT QUESTIONS PLEASE
@MurdocGorillaz You should wear it more often
@MurdocGorillaz NOT INSPIRING AT ALL BUT THANKS ANYWAYS I GUESS
@MurdocGorillaz but how did you show up, you are gREEN
@thugsbunnie Thanks for noticing, biscotti. That's due to the great new foundation 2D bought for me. Because I'm worth it.
Why are you getting greener and more luminous by THE HOUR  #DebunkDesole

#DebunkDesole
How’s it feel to be out of prison? I imagine you just escaped but you never know unless you ask.
@MurdocGorillaz What's your height then niccals?
@MurdocGorillaz Makes sense
@MurdocGorillaz you’re almost the size of the door. who is saying you are short???
@glowrillazart @MurdocGorillaz @Monielponi @kairose18 What if 2D lost them? I mean c'mon, he was eaten by a whale after phase 3 story, do you really think he kept all his hats?

Right, morons saying I’m short. Ever heard of PERSPECTIVE? When things are nearer to you, they get bigger. E.g., when a fist comes towards you, it gets bigger as it approaches your face. Plus, right, I was STOOPING at that point to convey my sadness (more great acting). OKAY. https://t.co/sUuO2cUbfk
